title: How do a set my Pixel phone's cast to disconnect from my Google home after 30 minutes of inactivity?
content:
I cast 1 hour of sleep music at night but the device stays in cast mode all night and drains the battery by morning.

I would like cast to automatically disconnect if there is no activity. Or, have the ability to set a timer to disconnect say 2 hours from now.

This gives me more control over my device and also does not unnecessarily drain my battery. I have missed my alarms because my phone died during the night.
